channel.title: CVE Feed for Asaancart -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Asaancart -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4826|2024-08-01T20:55:10.045Z -- asaancart -- simple%20php%20shopping%20cart
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Simple PHP Shopping Cart affecting version 0.9. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to retrieve all the information stored in the database by sending a specially crafted SQL query, due to the lack of proper sanitisation of the category_id parameter in the category.php file.

item.title: CVE-2024-4826|2024-05-16T12:44:06.827Z -- asaancart -- simple%20php%20shopping%20cart
